title: Bug report lol
body: omg i just play a rangar jg  and i stay in 5 star rage or something forever    i can use my abilities in a shot cd so lol yolo

replies.body: No don't do that he's going to get disabled again us rengar players are sick of thisâ€¦

Hey,
This bug happened a while back and was recently patched. However, if this has happened to you recently, you should go into a custom game and try and re create the situation so you can send it in as proof it happened.
